info.name: JVAI_Assessment_Task
info.description: This is the documentation of all the APIs of Assessment project (Simple E-commerce API).

item.name: User

request.description: We have to provide username, email, password to register a new user. Then the user will receive an email (in the console) to activate that account.

response.name: User Registration

item.description:
### **Overview**

This section contains user related APIs, such as user-registration, account-activation, user-profile.

item.description: Products listing, filtering by category, search functionality and pagination.

item.name: Place an order by Cart Id

request.description: Place an order by passing cart_id in the body, then if the cart contains at least an item, it returns a stripe session's url, which takes to the payment page (stripe checkout), after successful completion of payment, it redirects to a another page, upon failing redirects to another page
